snippet.title: Sliding Hero Gameplay - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Some new gameplay from pixel-art Metroidvania Sliding Hero, in which you must traverse a sinister Venetian villa - but you can only move in a single direction until you hit an obstacle. See how it works in this trailer, debuted as part of the Convergence Showcase. 

Wishlist it today, and try the demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2966300/Sliding_Hero/

#convergenceshow #indiegame
